question: [File: state-sync/aptos-data-client/src/client.rs] [Function: choose_serviceable_peer_for_subscription_request()] [Stream ID extraction] The stream ID extraction at lines 458-477 for different request types - can type confusion cause extraction of wrong stream IDs? (High)

[File: state-sync/aptos-data-client/src/client.rs] [Function: send_request_to_peer()] [Score update timing] The peer score success update at line 817 happens before response validation - can this be exploited to boost scores of malicious peers serving invalid data? (High)
